did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Sibley School of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering records, 1917-2009.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Sibley School of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering.

did.physdesc: Correspondence, photographs, printed material, research material.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, course material, and equipment manuals of the Sibley School of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering, formerly the Sibley School of Mechanical Engineering. Also the papers of Charles Osborn Mackey, Howard N. Fairchild, and Frank Oakes Ellenwood.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, course material, and equipment manuals of the Sibley School of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering, formerly the Sibley School of Mechanical Engineering. Also the papers of Charles Osborn Mackey, Howard N. Fairchild, and Frank Oakes Ellenwood.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Sibley School of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering.
Cornell University.Sibley School of Mechanical Engineering.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Sibley School of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering records, #16-5-1151. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
